Properties.Name: name
Properties.HelpText: The name of the item as displayed in the inventory. If left empty this is derived from the template name, although some templates may represent multiple items. Certain game functionality is associated with the item name.

Properties.Name: template_name
Properties.HelpText: The name of the item's template. This corresponds to the 'tempname' property found in the game's code.

Properties.Name: use_custom_rotation
Properties.HelpText: If set to No, the item's rotation will be randomized.

Properties.Name: angles
Properties.HelpText: In Euler angles and degrees. Only has an effect when 'Use Custom Rotation' is set to Yes.

Properties.Name: state
Properties.HelpText: Multi-purpose state variable. Exclusively used (for the purposes of a room editor) to represent the remaining power in battery-powered items. 0-1000 for the Night Vision Goggles, 0-100 for all others.

Properties.Name: chance
Properties.HelpText: The chance for this item to spawn. Between 0 and 1 where 1 means a guaranteed spawn and 0.25 means a 25% chance for the item to spawn.
